lines.text: By the time we're done with you, we're going to make Lee Harvey Oswald look like a fucking boy scout.
Errr. Sure. I mean you know, now and then.
Cuz this is just like wrestling.
Well it's reality, mixed with illusion, mixed with bullshit, mixed with... big scary guys from parts unknown, in dire need of psychiatric care.
Do they train you to be this vague, or is it a gift?
You can never spend too much on good intelligence.
I always enjoy it when an opponent raises the level of play.
Appearances are everything, Miss Fang. Politics and deception are built on it.
Listen to me. Governments they come, they go. But the McDonalds... they last for eva!

[over radio]
Novak, I'm experiencing the moment.
He's going to experience a Chinese labor camp in a moment if he doesn't stick to schedule.
